resources.string: Error opening the Database! Please restart the application in order to re-download the database.
Database is Expired, thus information may not be accurate and some features may not work. Please check periodically for updates.
Database download failed! Please restart the application in order to get a new database.

You have no Database installed, nor do you have an Internet connection. You need to download a database before your first use of the application. Please restart the application when you have Internet in order to Donwload the database.
